Robin Rendle
NotesEssaysAdventures
February 22, 2016 • Plymouth, UK

The Outpost

In all the excitement of recent months I forgot to mention that a couple of weeks ago we finished work on an update to The Outpost website. Blend modes! Viewport units! object-fit magic! This teaser combines a lot of the techniques that I’ve been learning about into one exciting project.

But, after seeing the constant stream of good news emanating from the space and the current line-up of members and patrons that have joined up, I can’t help but feel extraordinarily jealous. The two Andys are going to make that space really special in the weeks and months to come.
